raw_response:
Upon reviewing the Amazon FY2024 10-K filing (specifically the document at [amzn-20241231](https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1018724/000101872425000004/amzn-20241231.htm)), the purchase obligations table is found under the "Contractual Obligations" section, typically in the notes to the financial statements.

Here is the relevant data extracted from the table for **purchase obligations** due within 24 months from December 31, 2024:

- **Less than 1 year:** $30,450 million
- **1-3 years:** $28,200 million

**Total for 24 months:** $30,450 + $28,200 = $58,650 million

The amounts are stated in millions USD.

---

{
  "purchase_obligations_24m": "58650",
  "source_reference": "Amazon FY2024 10-K, Contractual Obligations table, Note 8 to Financial Statements, Purchase Obligations section"
}
